relics.name: Happy Teddy Bear's Page
relics.description: Choose 1 effect upon pickup.

relics.name: Laetitia's Page
relics.description: Choose 1 effect upon pickup.

relics.name: Mountain of Smiling Bodies's Page
relics.description: Choose 1 effect upon pickup.

relics.name: Punishing Bird's Page
relics.description: Choose 1 effect upon pickup.

relics.name: Red Shoes' Page
relics.description: Choose 1 effect upon pickup.

relics.name: The Funeral of the Dead Butterflies' Page
relics.description: Choose 1 effect upon pickup.

relics.name: The Knight of Despair's Page
relics.description: Choose 1 effect upon pickup.

relics.name: The Silent Orchestra's Page
relics.description: Choose 1 effect upon pickup.

relics.name: Three Birds' Page
relics.description: Choose 1 effect upon pickup.

relics.name: A Backstreets Butcher, Page 1
relics.description: Max HP: 62. Whenever you deal attack damage to an enemy with Bleed, deal additional 2 Thorns damage.
relics.flavorText: A guest walked into a restaurant for a meal, but then the chef fell in love with them! They had the perfect amount of tenderness and girth. The chef pulled out a knife, and the guest ended up on a plate. You'll become the food you appreciated one day, and others will appreciate what you've become.

relics.name: A Backstreets Butcher, Page 2
relics.description: Max HP: 62. Whenever you deal attack damage to an enemy with Bleed, deal additional 2 Thorns damage.
relics.flavorText: Butchering a human is a lot simpler than butchering other animals. Most of them are smaller than us. Which means we can subdue them right away even if they try to resist.

relics.name: A Bayard's Office Fixer's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 86. Speed1. At the start of turn, gain 3 Frail and 1 Strength. Once a turn, when you played a card, if you have no debuff, gain [E] and draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Charles' Office, the place Renaud worked, was popular among Fixers. It was the subject of a lot of gossip.

relics.name: A Blade Lineage Cutthroat’s Page
relics.description: Max HP: 73. Increase attack damage of Slash cards by 1. Whenever you play a Slash card, apply 1 Bleed.
relics.flavorText: It's little more than a cohort of people who have nowhere else to go, or those who carry the intent to murder someone.

relics.name: A Church of Gears Worshipper’s Page
relics.description: Max HP: 84. Smoke will increase damage you dealt instead of taken. Whenevr you gain Smoke, increase its stack by 1. At the start of your turn, gain 2 Vigor. Increase the number of your Evade Cards by 2.
relics.flavorText: As the gears turn, our bodies are put in motion.

relics.name: A Grade 7 Fixer, Page 1
relics.description: Max HP: 63. Increase the damage of Slash cards by 2.
relics.flavorText: This is a tough job, I tell you. It might be better for you to try and enter a small company to do desk work instead.

relics.name: A Grade 7 Fixer, Page 2
relics.description: Max HP: 63. Increase the damage of Slash cards by 2.
relics.flavorText: Syndicate or Fixer, once you set foot in this business, all the things will bind you like shackles, slowly dragging you to the bottom.

relics.name: A Grade 7 Fixer, Page 3
relics.description: Max HP: 63. Increase the damage of Pierce cards by 3.
relics.flavorText: A Fixer’s freedom is only truly complete when they are given a color from the Hana Association. Don’t go around proclaiming that you’ll become one of the ‘Colors’, though.

relics.name: A Grade 8 Fixer, Page 1
relics.description: Max HP: 63. Increase the damage of Slash cards by 1.
relics.flavorText: I became a Fixer trying not to starve, but the taxes have put me in an even tougher hardship.

relics.name: A Grade 8 Fixer, Page 2
relics.description: Max HP: 63. Increase the damage of Slash cards by 1.
relics.flavorText: In the City, orders are to be followed. We all know what happens if we don’t abide by them...

relics.name: A Grade 8 Fixer, Page 3
relics.description: Max HP: 75. Increase the damage of Pierce cards by 2.
relics.flavorText: Choosing the right Office is also important, but you can worry about that later. Only the skilled ones can afford to make choices, like decline offers from Offices or ask to be transferred to another.

relics.name: A Hana Fixer’s Page
relics.description: Max HP: 87. Speed2. At the start of your turn, if you have no Trigram Card, add 4 Trigram Cards into your hand.
relics.flavorText: We must exercise concentration and resoluteness in all situations.

relics.name: A Hook Office Fixer, Page 1
relics.description: Max HP: 62. Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: The Syndicate paid us more cash. What could I do about it? We don’t write official contracts or anything, so the highest bidder gets our favor. No use glaring at me like that, pal.

relics.name: A Hook Office Fixer, Page 2
relics.description: Max HP: 62. Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Backstreets are spread all over the City, and the Nests are no exception. But all this means is that “there are Backstreets in the Nests”, since the Nests are completely segregated from the Backstreets in terms of access.

relics.name: A Jeong's Office Fixer's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 62. Once a turn, when you discard, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Most residents in Nest J are relying on a special entity. I can't talk much about it, but it's like the fortune readings others sometimes see.

relics.name: A Leaflet Workshop Fixer's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 87. Speed1. Smoke will increase damage you dealt instead of taken. At the start of turn, if you have at least 8 Smoke, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Greeting guests is the one thing that's more dangerous than developing new weapons when you run a workshop.

relics.name: A Liu Fixer's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 81. If you have at least 12 total emotion, increase attack damage by 3.
relics.flavorText: ost requests that come our way aren’t complicated. Nine out of ten are resolved by simply marching towards enemies and defeating them in battle.

relics.name: A Mirae Insurer's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 86. Speed1. At the start of turn, if you lost HP last turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: As long as the conditions are met, the payout will fill in for financial damage. Of course... not all accidents will fit the insurance's bill perfectly.

relics.name: A Night Awl's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 86. Speed1. When attacking enemy with HP less than 10%, gain 1 Strength. Increase the damage of Pierce cards by 2.
relics.flavorText: In other places, mistakes would just cost ya own life, but losing your credit in meetings like that means the members of your Syndicate are also biting the dust.

relics.name: A Puppet, Page 1
relics.description: Max HP: 74. Increase the damage of Blunt cards by 1. If the size of your hand more than 4, increase damage damage by 1.
relics.flavorText: All they care about is guessing who will win.

relics.name: A Puppet, Page 2
relics.description: Max HP: 79. Speed2. Increase the damage of Blunt cards by 3.
relics.flavorText: We just earn a bit more than others, and live in a bit more comfort than others.

relics.name: A Rabbit Team Soldier’s Page
relics.description: Max HP: 77. Speed1. Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 additional card next turn. At the start of your turn, if you have at least 10 Charge, draw 1 additional card.
relics.flavorText: We’ll leave ourselves open for attacks if we take our sweet time to tell ‘em apart, so we’ve got to strike first.

relics.name: A Reindeer Team Soldier’s Page
relics.description: Max HP: 77. Speed1. Whenever you lose 6 HP, gain 1 Strength. if you have at least 10 Charge, whenever you attack an enemy, it lose 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: The electric stimuli generated in the Reindeer’s brain are condensed at the tip of these horns. The concentrated electricity is then collected by our staves for attacks.

relics.name: A Rhino Team Soldier’s Page
relics.description: Max HP: 77. Speed1. Whenever you lose 6 HP, gain 1 Dexterity. Each combat once, at the start of your turn, if you have at least 10 Charge, gain 2 Protection.
relics.flavorText: Us Rhinos specialize in using physical strength. We’re good at pushing ahead, if nothing else!

relics.name: A Rusted Chainlink's page
relics.description: Max HP: 65. Increase attack damage by 2 when attacking enemy with Bleed.

relics.name: A Seven Association Fixer's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 72. Increase attack damage by 2 when attacking enemy with Frail or Vulnerable.

relics.name: A Shi Association Fixer's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 201. At the start of each combat, if your HP is more than 25%, reduce it to 25%. Every time you Exhaust 4 cards, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Being an organization that is familiar with dealing death, the Shi’s code of honor is to treat every person equally, as the weight of death is equal for everyone.

relics.name: A Smiling Face's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 77. Smoke will increase damage you dealt instead of taken.
relics.flavorText: The rules o’ the Backstreets don’t work in the Nest, and the opposite’s also true.

relics.name: A Stray Dog's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 63. Increase the damage of Blunt cards by 2.
relics.flavorText: It’s true that our Syndicate’s sorta intimidating and got a tight hierarchy goin’ on, but the bond between members is strong.

relics.name: A Sweeper's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 74. Increases Block gained from cards by 1. Whenever you Exhaust a card, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: In other words, the Night in the Backstreets is the rein that keeps this place in check. Because the Night exists, people here show the least amount of human decency.

relics.name: A Thumb Soldato’s Page
relics.description: Max HP: 85. Speed1. Every time you play 3 non-Range Attack, add 1 Ammunition into your hand.
relics.flavorText: The Thumb is the most cultivated and humane of the Five Fingers. Just be polite, and know to respect others.

relics.name: A Workshop-affiliated Fixer's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 64. At the end of turn, if you didn't Exhaust any card, gain 1 Strength, if you Exhausted at least 4 cards, gain 2 Weak.
relics.flavorText: The Tres Association is the one responsible for managing those workshops in general. It reviews newly designed weapons, files applications to the Head, and charges taxes for them.

relics.name: A Yun's Office Fixer, Page 1
relics.description: Max HP: 61. Increase attack damage of Slash cards by 1.
relics.flavorText: The society of Fixers is built entirely up on meritocracy. The greater you are, the higher you can climb. On the other hand, if you don’t have the capability, you should be thankful for any org that accepts you and stay low.

relics.name: A Zwei Fixer's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 63. Every time you play 4 cards, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: The Zwei tends to be more defensive than other Associations or Offices. Our main purpose is not to fight and win, but rather to ensure the safety of our clients.

relics.name: Allen's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 95. Speed3. When attacking enemy with HP less than 10%, gain 1 Strength. Increase the damage of Pierce cards by 2. Remove the target's Block after attack.
relics.flavorText: I told him to be more careful since his words and actions as the boss will affect his underlings as well, yet here we are.

relics.name: Alloc's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 76. At the start of each combat, apply 1 Paralysis to a random enemy for 3 times.
relics.flavorText: A notary public Office preserves evidence involved in contractual processes and certifies legal issues. Sometimes, the Office may play the role of a broker.

relics.name: An Axe Gang Member, Page 1
relics.description: Max HP: 63. Increase the damage of Blunt cards by 1.
relics.flavorText: I heard some Offices straight up ban killing people, even. Something about life being precious and whatevs. It’s bullcrap.

relics.name: An Axe Gang Member, Page 2
relics.description: Max HP: 75. Increase the damage of Slash cards by 3, decrease the damage of Pierce cards by 1.
relics.flavorText: Welp, who’s to say Syndicates can’t be the good guys, right? We’re living as we like in the Backstreets.

relics.name: An Index Proselyte's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 78. At the start of each combat, draw 1 additional card. Increase attack damage of a random Damage Types by 2.
relics.flavorText: No two Prescripts are the same in any way; as well as their contents being completely different from each other, you can’t expect when and where you’ll receive one.

relics.name: An Udjat's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 89. Speed2. At the start of turn, if you lost HP last turn, heal 2 HP and gain 2 Plated Armor. Whenever you lose HP, gain 1 Plated Armor.
relics.flavorText: We are Udjat. While it's a Grade 1 Office on the surface, we only receive requests from one person.

relics.name: Anton's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 76. Increases Block gained from cards by 1. If you dealt attack damage this turn, heal 2 HP at the end of turn. Whenever you Exhaust a card, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: Our body is composed of liquid. Liquid is the substance that fuels our body. While humans maintain their form with the shell they call flesh and skin, we maintain our form with the suit we wear.

relics.name: Arnold's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 65. The first damage you deal each turn apply 1 Paralysis.
relics.flavorText: The City consists of 25 Nests, and 25 Districts of the Backstreets that surround those Nests. And countless Offices and Syndicates reside in the Backstreets.

relics.name: Bada's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 84. Speed2. Whenever you cost Charge, gain 1 Strength. At the start of your turn, if you gain Charge last turn, gain 1 Strength, if you cost Charge last turn, gain 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: The Head’s rules don’t cover every small detail, so you can say this is a necessary addition to fill those gaps.

relics.name: Bamboo-hatted Kim's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 78. Speed3. Increase the damage of cards with 1 base attack time by 3. Increase attack damage of Slash cards by 5. Whenever you play a Slash card, apply 1 Bleed.
relics.flavorText: We value the art of violence more than anything here; those with an unscathed body are not permitted to join us.

relics.name: Bayard's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 96. Speed1. At the start of turn, gain 3 Frail and 1 Strength. Once a turn, when you played a card, if you have no debuff, gain [E] and draw 1 card. When you played a card, gain 2 Protection and Dexterity that cannot be stacked.
relics.flavorText: It was a ragtag band of people without a place to call home, like Rats.

relics.name: Bono's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 70. Every 2 turns, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: People are hung up on money, but it’s not just because they want to be well off; the formidable tax burden is a big part of why. No matter how humble your job is, you’re still obliged to pay your duties if you earn money.

relics.name: Boris's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 89. Speed2. When you lose HP, decrease HP lose by 2.
relics.flavorText: The Thumb uses various types of bullets. We pick the right ammo for the right situation.

relics.name: Carnival's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 70. If you has Exhausted any card this combat, gain 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: We are Tailors who consume people and make silk out of them.

relics.name: Cecil's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 84. Speed2. If you have at least 12 total emotion, increase attack damage by 3. Every time you gain 6 total emotion, gain 2 Plated Armor.
relics.flavorText: However, victory isn’t necessarily won in battle. The ideal course of action begins by identifying the reason the enemy intends to fight in the first place. Next, we break the enemy’s will. Only then will we launch an attack on enemy forces.

relics.name: Chun's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 86. Speed2. If you have at least 12 total emotion, increase attack damage by 3. Each combat 2 times, when you apply Burn, double its stack.
relics.flavorText: Right now, Nest L is practically a warzone with all the Associations, Syndicates, and Fixers at each other’s throats.

relics.name: Consta's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 68. The first damage you deal each turn apply 1 Paralysis.
relics.flavorText: I still wanna try more delicious foods, though. Hot and flavorful… Spicy and sweet… Stuff like that.

relics.name: Dalloc's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 70. Whenever you deal attack damage to an enemy with Paralysis, deal additional 2 Thorns damage.
relics.flavorText: The Nest is a home where birds brood their eggs. They use their wings to devotedly protect their eggs from outside threat. Such is the role of the Nests and Wings that constitute the City.

relics.name: Dante's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 80. Speed2. Increase attack damage by 2 when attacking enemy with Frail or Vulnerable. At the end of turn, apply 1 Frail to a random enemy. Increase attack damage by 30% when attacking enemy with at least 5 Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: Some things are better left unknown—for the sake of the safety of this world.

relics.name: Dennis's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 82. Speed2. Every time you play 3 non-Range Attack, add 1 random Ammunition into your hand. Every time you Exhaust 3 Ammunition cards, add 1 random Ammunition into your hand at the start of next turn.
relics.flavorText: The degree of violation is irrelevant; that doesn’t decide the weight of the purge. The one thing that matters the most is the fact that they showed insolence. The lesson is marked with blood.

relics.name: Dino's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 68. Increase attack damage by 1.
relics.flavorText: There’s tons of tattoo types depending on the quality of the ink and the material used, but generally speaking, you can have results like bursts of strength or skin as hard as steel.

relics.name: Dong-hwan the Grade 1 Fixer’s Page
relics.description: Max HP: 87. Speed3. If you have at least 12 total emotion, increase attack damage by 3. Every time you gain 8 total emotion, gain 1 Protection and Dexterity. Increase attack damage by 3 when attacking enemy with Bleed.
relics.flavorText: The two entities at the center of all the problems that have been happening in L Corp's Nest lately—now that they've marked their presence in the City's sky as Stars.

relics.name: Ema's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 79. Speed2. Increase the damage of Blunt cards by 1. Increase the damage and Block of cards with cost higher than 2 by 1.
relics.flavorText: Each Nest has its Singularity.

relics.name: Eri's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 65. Start each combat with 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Just look at me, though! It took a teensy little procedure for me to lift this humongous weapon with one hand. This is the kind of power you can get, you see?

relics.name: Esther's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 86. Speed3. Play 12 cards with different names in one combat to enter Index Release, gain 2 Strength and Dexterity at the start of your turn. Every time you play 6 cards, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: It can be written on any kind of paper, and as long as it is stamped with the seal of the Index, it’ll pass as a real Prescript.

relics.name: Finn's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 65. Every you Exhaust 4 cards, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: I have good news. I finally joined an Office run by this guy named ‘Yun’ and officially became a Fixer.

relics.name: Gin's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 70. Whenever you deal attack damage, apply 1 Bleed. Whenever you play a Slash card, apply 1 Bleed.
relics.flavorText: The former feathers don’t have a choice in this matter. If they don’t pay the fee, they’ll die or get kicked out. It would be a miracle to walk out unharmed.

relics.name: Gloria's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 86. Speed3. Play 12 cards with different names in one combat to enter Index Release, gain 2 Strength and Dexterity at the start of your turn. At the start of your turn, if you have at least 12 total emotion, reduce the cost or random card in your hand by [E] .
relics.flavorText: Each of us uses different types of blades. Starting with the ranks of Messengers and Proxies, the Prescripts give personalized swords.

relics.name: Gyeong-Mi's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 76. Speed2. If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an additional [E] next turn.
relics.flavorText: Expensive gadgets crafted by premium workshops have almost zero side effects. On the other hand, this ring for example lets me deliver a harder blow with my punches, but it chafes the skin of my hand at the same time.

relics.name: Hanafuda's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 68. Speed3. Once a turn, when you discard, draw 1 card and gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: In the Nest of gambling, hundreds of games take place every day, the humans leaving as winners or losers.

relics.name: Harold’s Page
relics.description: Max HP: 93. Speed3. At the start of your turn, if you have no Trigram Card, add 4 Trigram Cards into your hand. Gain Block equals to 3 times of the damage you taken last turn.
relics.flavorText: The people who witness the sparkle of that Star admire how brilliantly it shines in the dark, and entertain the hope that they will shine as brightly one day, making yet more centers in the universe...

relics.name: Hubert's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 86. Speed3. Play 12 cards with different names in one combat to enter Index Release, gain 2 Strength and Dexterity at the start of your turn. Start each combat with 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: The Prescripts are a predetermined path; there is no point for Proselytes to refuse any. It’s still within their choice to decline the Prescript’s offer.

relics.name: Irina's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 96. Speed3. At the start of turn, reduce your random debuff by 1, if you lost HP last turn, gain [E] . At the start of turn, if your HP less than 30%, add a Life Insurance into your hand.
relics.flavorText: If people started reaping insurance payouts for the smallest things, our business wouldn't survive.

relics.name: Isadora's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 68. Increase attack damage of Slash cards by 2.
relics.flavorText: I was just reminded of the old times seeing San kneel down for the sake of his Office juniors. He never changes, huh?

relics.name: Jack's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 67. At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: So now Pierre and I have to pioneer a new supply chain on our own. I don’t think this is all too bad, though. I enjoy working with Pierre a lot.

relics.name: Jikan's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 70. Speed2. Increase attack damage by 2 when attacking enemy with Bleed. Whenever you make yourself lose HP, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: The only weapon we use is these spiky chains. Tie 'em, smack 'em, anythin' goes.

relics.name: Jin's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 79. Speed2. Smoke will increase damage you dealt instead of taken. Each turn once, when you attack an enemy with at least 8 stacks of Smoke, apply 2 Paralysis.
relics.flavorText: Rough things do happen often ‘round here, sure, but there’s some effort at peacekeeping goin’ on to stop a whole lotta people dying all the harking time.

relics.name: Julia's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 68. Increase attack damage of Slash cards by 2.
relics.flavorText: I still remember the day when the three of us met for the first time. It was when I joined my previous Office.

relics.name: Kalo's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 88. Speed3. Start each combat with 2 Protection. Every time you play 3 non-Range Attack, add 1 random Ammunition into your hand and gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Such is the rule of ours, and the respect to their position. Don’t be too bitter over it. Indeed, class is earned, not given for free; it’s only right to give it the respect it deserves.

relics.name: Katriel's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 82. Speed2. Every time you play 3 non-Range Attack, add 1 random Ammunition into your hand. Increase the damage of Range cards by 2.
relics.flavorText: The Thumb’s chain of command is simple: Obey the orders issued by your superior unconditionally, and do not question the intentions of your superior.

relics.name: Kurokumo Henchman's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 70. Whenever you play a Slash card, apply 1 Bleed.
relics.flavorText: You hear that news? We’re about to collide with Kingfishers again.

relics.name: Lenny's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 65.
relics.flavorText: Filthy losers who feed on junk and leftovers, not making any effort to change...

relics.name: Lesti's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 78. Whenever you deal attack damage, has a 10% chance to deal 10 additional Thorns damage. If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity at the end of your turn.
relics.flavorText: But, we aren’t totally powerless against those situations. We would’ve gotten into so many problems otherwise, yeah?

relics.name: Lowell's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 89. Speed3. If you have at least 12 total emotion, increase attack damage by 3, if more than 18, draw 1 additional card at the start of turn. Every time you gain 6 total emotion, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: The moment you get swayed by something you cherish, you lose yourself; you neglect your own safety.

relics.name: Lulu Friend, Page 1
relics.description: Max HP: 62.
relics.flavorText: A peacekeeping Office provides protection for requested territories for a certain period of time. Lulu’s is one of those Offices.

relics.name: Lulu Friend, Page 2
relics.description: Max HP: 62.
relics.flavorText: Lulu’s living a good life. At least she does something. And they don’t have to worry about starving to death even if they don’t get requests.

relics.name: Lulu Friend, Page 3
relics.description: Max HP: 67.
relics.flavorText: As her friend, it’s unfortunate that Lulu is struck with grief. I don’t have any tears to shed for her, though. I’ve got my share of rough experiences, I’m just not sharing it with others.

relics.name: Lulu Friend, Page 4
relics.description: Max HP: 67.
relics.flavorText: My Office figured that we could find plenty of valuable loot in the Library. And that’s pretty tempting. The other one is probably thinking the same thing as me.

relics.name: Lulu's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 70. Whenever you deal attack damage, apply 1 Burn.
relics.flavorText: I do bicker with Mars and snap at him often, yes! But that doesn’t mean I hate him. San and Mars are both precious colleagues to me.

relics.name: Lyla's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 76. Increases Block gained from cards by 1. If you dealt attack damage this turn, heal 2 HP at the end of turn. Whenever you Exhaust a card, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: We are conscious of the attention of people during the daytime. We practice caution. It would be a public nuisance to show up in broad daylight and cause a ruckus, and we have a set of rules that we abide to.

relics.name: MangChi's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 65.
relics.flavorText: Didja know? There’s grades for each alley in the Backstreets. Funny, ain’t it. Trash in a trash can are grading each other...

relics.name: Mars's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 78. Speed3. Whenever you deal attack damage to an enemy that not intend to attack, deal additional 2 Thorns damage.
relics.flavorText: My mother was a Fixer with a high grade that every one of my peers would dream of reaching.

relics.name: Martina's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 84. Speed2. Whenever you deal attack damage, deal 2 additional Thorns damage. At the start of your turn, if you gain Charge last turn, gain 1 Strength, if you cost Charge last turn, gain 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Notary acts exist to stop unnecessary disputes from occurring, and it’s the job of notary public Offices like Cane Office to help with that.

relics.name: Maxim's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 95. Speed3. Whenever you lose 6 HP, gain 1 Dexterity. Each combat once, at the start of your turn, if you have at least 10 Charge, gain 2 Protection. If you have at least 20 Charge, increase attack damage by 25%, decrease damage you received by 15%.
relics.flavorText: When one person’s pure ambition and another’s tragic obsession join together, a dream is destined to be born.

relics.name: McCullin's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 65. Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: If you have the skills to back yourself up, multiple organizations will make sweet offers to recruit you. What matters the most here is the relationships you’ve built. Your fate depends on the things you’ve done, or karma in other words.

relics.name: Mei's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 84. Speed2. If you have at least 12 total emotion, increase attack damage by 3. Every time you gain 6 total emotion, draw 1 cards.
relics.flavorText: It might look like a fancy suit with golden decorations at first glance, but you know how a Fixer’s attire is no ordinary clothing!

relics.name: Meow's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 74. Speed2. Start each combat with 2 Strength. The first Blunt card played each turn will apply 1 Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: To recreate the performance half as splendid as what we heard that day, we formed the Musicians of Bremen to study the music.

relics.name: Mi's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 79. Speed2. Smoke will increase damage you dealt instead of taken. Each turn once, when you are attacked without Block, gain Block equals to the stacks of Smoke.
relics.flavorText: If ye didn’t know, the City’s taboos are a ‘uge deal, ‘s much more serious than taboos of the Nest. You break it, and yer life’s over right then n’ there!

relics.name: Mika's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 68. Whenever you discard, heal 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: A Corp is the corporate in charge of managing and granting all patents. It’s the Head we’re talking about.

relics.name: Mirinae’s Page
relics.description: Max HP: 92. Speed3. At the start of your turn, if you have no Trigram Card, add 4 Trigram Cards into your hand. If you have Strength/#yDexterity/#yProtection, gain 1 random Strength/#yDexterity/#yProtection.
relics.flavorText: We’re renowned for rating the threat level of hazards that occur in the City, and grading Fixers and Offices.

relics.name: Miris’ Page
relics.description: Max HP: 86. Speed2. If you have at least 12 total emotion, increase attack damage by 3. When you attack an enemy, make it take damage at the end of its turn, equals to 25% of the stacks of its Burn.
relics.flavorText: In order to defeat the enemy, we must be roused to anger; to remember that one’s emotions must remain a means to motivate the body and not the ends, and to exploit the enemy’s wrath with this in mind.

relics.name: Mo's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 71. The first damage you deal each turn apply 1 Paralysis.
relics.flavorText: Aside from basic issues such as vulnerability to damage and creaky noises, cheap prosthetic bodies compromise too much. You’re basically giving up all the joys of life. Can you imagine?

relics.name: Mumu's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 70. Increase the damage of Blunt cards by 2. The first Blunt card played each turn will apply 1 Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: They say the Backstreets are a nigh-inhabitable hellscape, but the people here live on somehow.

relics.name: Myo's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 91. Speed3. Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 additional card next turn. At the start of your turn, if you have at least 10 Charge, draw 1 additional card. When you play a Range card, if it's Exhaust, have 30% chance to add a copy of it into your hand. If you have at least 4 cards in hand, increase the damage the Block of your cards by 1 for each additional card.
relics.flavorText: I got embarrassed of myself again. I thought I’d saved everyone, but after all, what I’ve been doing was far from being a hero.

relics.name: Naoki's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 65. Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: There’s a huge variety of workshops. As diverse as Syndicates and Fixers are, weapons need individuality to stand out in this day and age.

relics.name: Nemo's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 89. Speed3. Each combat once: When you would die, cost all Charge to heal 5 HP for each stack instead. At the start of your turn, if you gain Charge last turn, gain 1 Strength, if you cost Charge last turn, gain 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: We live in turbulent times when Wings are destined to fall behind in the market if they don’t respond to patent disputes effectively, big or small!

relics.name: Nicolai's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 91. Speed3. At the start of your turn, Mark a random enemy, increase damage it taken by 25%. At the start of your turn, if you have at least 10 Charge, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: In the past, the Fourth Pack was considered a thorn in the side of R Corp. In other words, we were a headache that they couldn’t find a good enough excuse to remove.

relics.name: Oink's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 70. At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to a random enemy 2 times. The first Blunt card played each turn will apply 1 Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: The Seven Association is a Fixer Association specializing in investigation and intelligence, and it’s knowledgeable in pretty much every affair that takes place in the City.

relics.name: Olga's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 83. Speed3. If you end your turn with no cards in your hand, gain an additional [E] and draw 1 additional card next turn.
relics.flavorText: Maybe it was because I got to drink with my old friend after a long while, or maybe it was the honor of having a seat with the famous captain of the Rabbit Team, but I was in a mighty good mood.

relics.name: Olivier’s Page
relics.description: Max HP: 96. Speed3. At the start of your turn, if you have no Trigram Card, add 4 Trigram Cards into your hand. Gain Block equals to 3 times of the damage you taken last turn. Start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: But now we’ve come too far to go back—so did you, and so did Charles’ Office.

relics.name: Oscar's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 84. Speed3. Increase the damage of Pierce cards by 4. Each combat once, when you would die, prevent that damage, and decrease damage you received this turn by 25.
relics.flavorText: The 8 o’Clock Circus was a real sod of a case. Its leader wasn’t a particularly powerful enemy, but it took a long time to assess the strengths and behavior of each of his "crew".

relics.name: Pamela's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 71. Increase the damage of Pierce cards by 3.
relics.flavorText: We were sister Offices with Dawn Office, sharing more information than we did with most other partners. Oscar is good friends with Salvador—the man running that Office.

relics.name: Pameli's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 71. Increase the damage of Pierce cards by 3.
relics.flavorText: Insurance can sometimes be useful depending on its form and conditions, sure… But if you take the pay into account, it still doesn’t feel too great.

relics.name: Pete's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 65.
relics.flavorText: We’re called Rats for a reason. We crawl about the dark in packs, and jump at prey for the chance to bite ‘em apart when we spot one.

relics.name: Pierre's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 73. Whenever an enemy dies, heal 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: Most cooks who live here have the same dream: becoming one of ‘The Eight Chefs’! They’re the people who pursue the ultimate delicacy.

relics.name: Rain's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 68. If you end your turn with no cards in your hand, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Requests made by Wings are quite different from those assigned by the Associations in several aspects.

relics.name: Rose's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 87. Speed3. Whenever you deal attack damage, has a 10% chance to deal 10 additional Thorns damage, and if you have at least 3 cards in your hand, has a 10% additional chance to deal 13 additional Thorns damage.
relics.flavorText: W Corp’s Singularity is the restoration of a previous status. To put it in layman’s terms, even if your body is crushed to a pulp, it can be restored to a recorded state as long as all the pieces remain.

relics.name: Rudolph's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 91. Speed3. Whenever you lose 6 HP, gain 1 Strength. if you have at least 10 Charge, whenever you attack an enemy, it lose 2 HP. Whenever you heal in combat, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity, up to 5.
relics.flavorText: Is it really an admirable trait to have no fear of death? I have to disagree. When you know that you’ll die someday, you don’t put off your duties forever.

relics.name: Salvador's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 82. Speed3. Start each combat with 2 Protection. Whenever you deal attack damage to an enemy with Burn, deal additional 2 Thorns damage. Whenever you apply Burn, increases its stack by 1.
relics.flavorText: Description: This document is a compilation of relevant information on the case of the Thousand Needles, which occurred in the Backstreets of District 22.

relics.name: San's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 68. The first Attack deal 3 additional damage each turn.
relics.flavorText: ...I can’t blame the Association, so I only have myself to fault for failing to save my guys.

relics.name: Sayo's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 74. Speed2. At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards. Increase the damage of Slash cards by 1. Whenever you play a Slash card, apply 1 Bleed.
relics.flavorText: When the Finger Bow-Bell nears, all members of the five Fingers will try to avoid conflict and refrain from causing big problems.

relics.name: Sen's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 78. Whenever you deal attack damage, has a 10% chance to deal 10 additional Thorns damage, and has a 5% additional chance to deal 13 additional Thorns damage.
relics.flavorText: Anyway, whatever happens in the train, we revert it using our Singularity of restoration, and T Corp. takes the time we collect for their own Singularity. We’re good business partners.

relics.name: Taein's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 71. Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: If you have trouble finding the perfect procedure or weapon for you, try bionic equipment. I guarantee it’s good.

relics.name: Tenma's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 219. Speed2. At the start of each combat, if your HP is more than 25%, reduce it to 25%. Every time you Exhaust 4 cards, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity. At the end of your turn, if you have [E] remain, gain an additional [E] next turn.
relics.flavorText: From the receipt of the request to preparation for execution, every step of an assassination is carried out covertly. Discreet killing is the Shi Association’s specialty.

relics.name: The Black Silence's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 96. Speed3. At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards. Every 4 cards you played, increase its damage and Block by 4. You can't change Key Page, can't use EGO.

relics.name: The Jester of Nihil's Page
relics.description: Choose 1 effect upon pickup.

relics.name: The Purple Tear's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 93. Speed3. Activate: Choose 1 Stance, need 1 turn to ready. At the start of each combat, trigger Activate effect once.
relics.flavorText: I can travel through time and space and see a myriad of possibilities, too many for you to possibly fathom. It’s probably a little bit different from time travel as you commonly imagine it.

relics.name: The Red Mist's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 92. Change your deck, you can't change your Key Page. Speed3. At the start of each combat, add 1 Greater Split: Vertical into your draw pile. When your total emotion reach 20, add 1 Manifest E.G.O into your draw pile. At the start of each combat, draw 5 additional cards.
relics.flavorText: E.G.O. The weapon that corresponds to the mind of its wielder. The sword Carmen gave me was extracted from someone by chance.

relics.name: Unstable Page of the Crying Children
relics.description: Max HP: 87. Speed3. Whenever you attack or be attacked, apply 1 Burn (back). Increase attack damage by 1 when you attack an enemy with Burn.
relics.flavorText: Turn a blind eye to all that tries to hurt me. Turn a deaf ear to words that will lead me down the wrong path. Turn a mute mouth to unnecessary evil. And last of all, act not. Make myself happy that way.

relics.name: Valentin's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 223. Speed2. At the start of each combat, if your HP is more than 25%, reduce it to 25%. Every time you Exhaust 4 cards, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity. Increase the damage of cards with 1 base attack time by 3.
relics.flavorText: Thelma, head of the Southern Branch, has been overworking Section 2 to a nonsensical degree lately. The requests he’s giving us are burdensome to take once per week, and he’s constantly cramming them down our throats, sapping the strength and will out of our section...

relics.name: Valerie's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 76. Increases Block gained from cards by 1. If you dealt attack damage this turn, heal 2 HP at the end of turn. Whenever you Exhaust a card, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: The Backstreets are our main stage of activity at night. When night falls, our world unfolds. At regular intervals, we start marching from the perimeter of a Nest and sweep everything as we move forward.

relics.name: WARP Cleanup Agent's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 78. Whenever you deal attack damage, has a 10% chance to deal 10 additional Thorns damage.
relics.flavorText: "Lobotomy Corp—the company that was supplying our energy needs—went down recently."

relics.name: Walter's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 75. Speed2. Increases Block gained from cards by 1.
relics.flavorText: It may seem too materialistic to you, but seeing how the Associations work, you’ll have to agree that money is their prime objective.

relics.name: Wang's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 79. Speed2. Smoke will increase damage you dealt instead of taken. Increase attack damage by (the stacks of Smoke * 5)%.
relics.flavorText: They call the Backstreets unsafe because there’s this one time o’ the day when darkness comes out and your friendly neighborhood watch can’t do jacks about it.

relics.name: Xiao’s Page
relics.description: Max HP: 95. Speed3. If you have at least 12 total emotion, increase attack damage by 3. Whenever you attack an enemy, apply 1 Burn, and make it apply Burn to other enemies at the end of its turn, equals to 25% of the stacks of its Burn. When your total emotion reach 10, manifest E.G.O. When your total emotion reach 20, enhance E.G.O.
relics.flavorText: A familiar place, a familiar mind, a familiar person. And I plan to reunite with you soon. I want to tell you that I no longer have shame for the path I’ve chosen, and that I have finally freed myself from the guilt.

relics.name: Yae's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 94. Speed3. Smoke will increase damage you dealt instead of taken. At the start of turn, gain 1 Strength or gain 1 Dexterity or draw 2 cards at random, and if you have at least 8 Smoke, gain 1 extra Strength.
relics.flavorText: There's a new gadget to test anyway, and to witness a technology that's still obscure and hot off the presses... That just makes your heart throb, doesn't it?

relics.name: Yang's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 70. Whenever you apply Bleed, increases its stack by 1. Whenever you play a Slash card, apply 1 Bleed.
relics.flavorText: There are two kinds of folks who hang around in the Backstreets at night: the predator and the prey.

relics.name: Yujin's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 244. Speed3. At the start of each combat, if your HP is more than 25%, reduce it to 25%. Start each combat with 1 Strength and Dexterity. Every time you Exhaust 4 cards, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity. Whenevr you play a card with cost higher than 3, gain [E] [E] . Each turn once, when you are attacked without Block, gain 12 Block.
relics.flavorText: I am but waiting for the right time. Waiting and enduring until I seize the chance to bring the Shi back to glory… I firmly believe that everything will take a turn for the better once I take care of this work.

relics.name: Yun's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 71. Whenever you take damage not more than 3, evade it.
relics.flavorText: In this City, worse things are happening here and there on a daily basis. If he didn’t die there, he could’ve faced a much more terrible fate somewhere else, isn’t that right?

relics.name: Yuna's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 70. If you Exhausted at least 4 cards this combat, gain 3 Strength. Whenever you apply Burn, increases its stack by 1.
relics.flavorText: Audio Transcript of Testimony from District 22 Resident 1.

relics.name: Zena's Page
relics.description: In fact, she is still Garion, but looks like Zena, exactly the same! Projection technology, isn't it amazing?
relics.flavorText: Well, actually, it's not exactly the same. You can still see she's Garion in words and deeds. NL And don't tell her about this page, or you will bear the consequences!

relics.name: Zulu's Page
relics.description: Max HP: 68. Every 3 turns, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Even if you make your way up to the big leagues and become a decently influential Syndicate, there’s still loads of stronger gangs above ya, and they peck at you all the same.

relics.name: rnfmabj’s Page
relics.description: Max HP: 93. Speed3. If the number of your relics not less than the size of your deck, start each combat with 1 Strength and Dexterity. At the start of each turn, add 1 Prescript card into your hand. If you have at least 20 total emotion, add 1 additional Prescript.
relics.flavorText: The nightmares have been with me for a good majority of my life. If I close my eyes, the memory of that time haunts me—and if I open my eyes, a reality I can hardly bear unfolds.

relics.name: Dream of a Black Swan's Page
relics.description: Choose 1 effect upon pickup.

keywords.name: Activate
keywords.description: Right click to activate.

keywords.name: Ammunition
keywords.description: Attack card that costs 0 energy. Counts as Ranged attack card. Has Exhaust and Ethereal. When this card is discarded, Exhaust it. Gain Retain for this turn when this card is drawn.

keywords.name: Bleed
keywords.description: Bleeding targets lose health equal of the number of Bleed stacks whenever they are attacked. Bleed stacks decrease by 1/3 each turn.

keywords.name: Blunt
keywords.description: Damage type of card.

keywords.name: Burn
keywords.description: Burning targets lose health equal to the number of Burn stacks at the start of their turn. Burn stacks decrease by 1 each turn.

keywords.name: Chargelimit
keywords.description: Can only be played if you have at least 20 Charge.

keywords.name: Decay
keywords.description: Decaying targets lose health equal to the number of Decay stacks at the start of their turn and whenever they attack. Decay stacks decrease by 1 each turn.

keywords.name: Erasure
keywords.description: Remove this card from the deck after playing it.

keywords.name: Evade
keywords.description: Gain Retain for this turn when this card is drawn. Gain Block equal to half the Evade amount when this card is played.

keywords.name: Fairy
keywords.description: Targets under the Fairy effect lose health equal to the number of Fairy stacks at the start and end of their turn. Fairy stacks decrease by half each turn.

keywords.name: Index
keywords.description: Requires Index Release state to be played. If there is no corresponding page, this card is removed from combat at the start of combat.

keywords.name: Paralysis
keywords.description: Decreases attack damage by 3 , effect is reduced by 1 after attacking. Each Paralysis stack increases the effect by 1.

keywords.name: Persistence
keywords.description: Heal HP equal to 0% of HP lost when you lose HP, and decrease Persistence stack by 1. Each Persistence stack increases the percentage by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.

keywords.name: Prompt
keywords.description: When this card is drawn, play it.

keywords.name: Protection
keywords.description: Reduce damage taken from attacks equal of the number of Protection stacks.

keywords.name: Singleton
keywords.description: Apart from starter cards, your deck contains no duplicate cards.

keywords.name: Smoke
keywords.description: Increases damage received based on the number of Smoke stacks. Damage and Block values on cards are increased by 1 for every 8 stacks of Smoke. Smoke stacks decrease by 1 each turn.

keywords.name: Speed1
keywords.description: If you have at least 12 total emotion, gain [E] at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Speed2
keywords.description: If you have at least 6 total emotion, gain [E] at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Speed3
keywords.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Spores
keywords.description: Targets under the Spore effect lose health equal to the number of Spore stacks at the start of their turn and whenever they attack. Spore stacks decrease by 1 each turn.
